_meta.description: 從 WASP GHX 範例提取的組件參數資訊

inputs.name: GEO
inputs.description: Geometry of the part to which the connection belongs

inputs.name: CEN
inputs.description: Origin of the connection plane

inputs.name: UP
inputs.description: Line idetifying the X-axis of the connection plane - determines the plane orientation to mantain when transforming

inputs.name: T
inputs.description: OPTIONAL // Connection type (to be used with Rule Generator component)

outputs.name: out
outputs.description: The execution information, as output and error streams

outputs.name: PLN_OUT
outputs.description: Plane for each connection object (for debugging)

inputs.name: PART
inputs.description: Part from which to extract the attribute

inputs.name: ID
inputs.description: Name of the attribute to extract

outputs.name: VAL
outputs.description: Value stored in the requested attribute

inputs.name: PART
inputs.description: Parts to be aggregated (can be more than one)

inputs.name: PREV
inputs.description: Previous aggregated parts. It is possible to input the results of a previous aggregation, or parts transformed with the TransformPart component

inputs.name: RULES
inputs.description: Rules sequence in text form (WIP)

inputs.name: ID
inputs.description: OPTIONAL // Aggregation ID (to avoid overwriting when having different aggregation components in the same file)

inputs.name: RESET
inputs.description: Recompute the whole aggregation

outputs.name: PART_OUT
outputs.description: Aggregated parts (includes both PREV input and newly aggregated parts)

inputs.name: ID
inputs.description: Name of the attribute

inputs.name: VAL
inputs.description: Value of the attribute (any type of Gh-compatible data possible)

inputs.name: TR
inputs.description: OPTIONAL // Transformable. Set it to True for Geometry, False for other types of data (False by default)

outputs.name: ATTR
outputs.description: Attribute instance to attach to a component

inputs.name: NAME
inputs.description: Part name

inputs.name: GEO
inputs.description: Part geometry. It will be converted to mesh - to improve performance, perform the conversion before adding to the part and user a low-poly count

inputs.name: CONN
inputs.description: Connections list

inputs.name: COLL
inputs.description: OPTIONAL // Collider geometry (for collision detection). A collider will be automatically generated. For complex parts, automatic generation might not

inputs.name: ATTR
inputs.description: OPTIONAL // Part attributes

inputs.name: UPDATE
inputs.description: Set to "True" if you want this component to search through the current Grasshopper file and update all Wasp components.

inputs.name: SUB_FOL
inputs.description: OPTIONAL // If the Wasp user objects have been placed in a sub-folder, name of the sub-folder in the Gh UserObjects folder.

inputs.name: PART
inputs.description: Parts definition for the aggregation

inputs.name: FILE
inputs.description: File where the DisCo aggregation is saved (.json)

inputs.name: RENUM
inputs.description: True to renumber ids coming from DisCo. This is necessary to allow correct import of aggregations where the delete commands have been used (True by de

inputs.name: AGGR
inputs.description: Aggregation to save

inputs.name: PATH
inputs.description: Path where to save the aggregation

inputs.name: NAME
inputs.description: Name of the exported file

inputs.name: SAVE
inputs.description: True to export

inputs.name: NAME
inputs.description: Rule group name. It will be used to activate/deactivate the rules contained in DisCo

inputs.name: GR
inputs.description: Rule grammars to be included in the group

inputs.name: PART
inputs.description: Part to be transformed

inputs.name: TR
inputs.description: Transformation

inputs.name: NAME
inputs.description: Player name

inputs.name: VRFPS
inputs.description: Player mode: 0 for VR player, 1 for FPS player

inputs.name: SCALE
inputs.description: Player scale factor (1.0 by default)

inputs.name: TS
inputs.description: OPTIONAL // Tool settings (all tools availabe by default)

inputs.name: PS
inputs.description: OPTIONAL // Placement settings (all placement modes availabe by default)

inputs.name: IOS
inputs.description: OPTIONAL // IO settings (all IO modes availabe by default)

inputs.name: PC
inputs.description: OPTIONAL // Point constraints for fixing the player position

inputs.name: BC
inputs.description: OPTIONAL // Box constraints for limiting the player movement area

inputs.name: CC
inputs.description: OPTIONAL // Curve constraints for limiting the player movement along the curve

inputs.name: CCS
inputs.description: OPTIONAL // Curve constraint sample resolution (0.1 by default)

inputs.name: PART
inputs.description: Parts to be aggregated (can be more than one)

inputs.name: PREV
inputs.description: OPTIONAL // Previous aggregated parts. It is possible to input the results of a previous aggregation, or parts transformed with the TransformPart comp

inputs.name: N
inputs.description: Number of parts to be aggregated (does not count parts provided in PREV)

inputs.name: RULES
inputs.description: Rules for the aggregation

inputs.name: SEED
inputs.description: OPTIONAL // Random seed. Set this to a fixed number to allow recreating the same aggregation every time you reset.

inputs.name: CAT
inputs.description: OPTIONAL // Part Catalog (to specify fixed numbers or proportions between part types

inputs.name: MODE
inputs.description: OPTIONAL // Switches between aggregation modes: 0 = no constraints, 1 = local constraints, 2 = global constraints, 3 = local + global constraints

inputs.name: GC
inputs.description: OPTIONAL // Global constraints to apply to aggregation

inputs.name: ID
inputs.description: OPTIONAL // Aggregation ID

inputs.name: RESET
inputs.description: Recompute the whole aggregation

outputs.name: PART_OUT
outputs.description: Aggregated parts (includes both PREV input and newly aggregated parts)

inputs.name: PART
inputs.description: Part from where to extract the geometry

inputs.name: PART
inputs.description: Parts to be aggregated in DisCo

inputs.name: RULES
inputs.description: Aggregation rules

inputs.name: RULE_G
inputs.description: OPTIONAL // Rule groups for filtering

inputs.name: PROB
inputs.description: OPTIONAL // Probability distribution for each part

inputs.name: SPAWN_N
inputs.description: OPTIONAL // Number of each part created at start-up

inputs.name: PART
inputs.description: Parts from which to generate aggregation rules

inputs.name: SELF_P
inputs.description: OPTIONAL // Create rules between connections belonging to the same part (True by default)

inputs.name: SELF_C
inputs.description: OPTIONAL // Create rules between connection with same id (True by default)

inputs.name: TYP
inputs.description: OPTIONAL // Create rules only between connections of the same type (False by default). Make sure this component is set to False when using Rule Gramma

inputs.name: GR
inputs.description: OPTIONAL // Custom connection grammar with format "ConnType">"ConnType"

inputs.name: PART
inputs.description: Parts to filter

inputs.name: NAME
inputs.description: Name of the parts to extract

outputs.name: MASK
outputs.description: Boolean mask for the filtered parts

inputs.name: GEO
inputs.description: Plane to use as constraints

inputs.name: IN
inputs.description: OPTIONAL // False to allow only parts outside the constraint geometry, True to allow parts only inside (True by default)

inputs.name: SOFT
inputs.description: OPTIONAL // True to check only the part center point, False to check also for geometry intersection (True by default)

inputs.name: REQ
inputs.description: OPTIONAL // True to make the constrains necessary for the aggregation to happen, False to make it optional (True by default)

inputs.name: PART
inputs.description: OPTIONAL // Name of the parts to which the constraint is supposed to be applied on. If not specified, the constraint is applied to all parts

inputs.name: NP
inputs.description: OPTIONAL // Allow control over the number of affected parts (True by default)

inputs.name: PF
inputs.description: OPTIONAL // Allow use of the Part Filter (True by default)

inputs.name: RF
inputs.description: OPTIONAL // Allow use of Rules Filter (True by default)

inputs.name: PLACE
inputs.description: OPTIONAL // Allow choice between different placement modes. Available modes are defined with the DisCo Placement Settings component (True by default)

inputs.name: FIELD
inputs.description: OPTIONAL // Allow use of the Field drawing tool (True by default)

inputs.name: SL
inputs.description: OPTIONAL // Allow to access the Save-Load tool. Available Modes are defined with the DisCo IO Settings component (True by default)

inputs.name: SIM
inputs.description: OPTIONAL // Allow to simulate rigid-body physics (True by default)

inputs.name: CHAR
inputs.description: OPTIONAL // Allow access to Fly and NoClip characted modes (True by default)

inputs.name: SCALE
inputs.description: OPTIONAL // Allow to change the character scale (True by default)

outputs.name: TS
outputs.description: DisCo tool settings (to use with the DisCoPlayer component)

inputs.name: PLACE
inputs.description: OPTIONAL // Allow use of the Place tool (True by default)

inputs.name: CHOREO
inputs.description: OPTIONAL // Allow use of the Choreograph tool (True by default)

inputs.name: SHOOT
inputs.description: OPTIONAL // Allow use of the Shoot tool (True by default)

inputs.name: GROW
inputs.description: OPTIONAL // Allow use of the Grow tool (True by default)

inputs.name: PICK
inputs.description: OPTIONAL // Allow use of the Pick-and-Place tool (True by default)

inputs.name: DEL
inputs.description: OPTIONAL // Allow use of the Delete tool (True by default)

inputs.name: DEL_R
inputs.description: OPTIONAL // Allow to save and load results (True by default)

inputs.name: DEL_SP
inputs.description: OPTIONAL // Allow use of the Sphere Delete tool (True by default)

inputs.name: DIS
inputs.description: OPTIONAL // Allow use of the Disable-Enable tool (True by default)

outputs.name: PS
outputs.description: DisCo placement settings (to use with the DisCoPlayer component)

inputs.name: SAVE
inputs.description: OPTIONAL // Allow to save game results to file (True by default)

inputs.name: LOAD
inputs.description: OPTIONAL // Allow to load previously saved files (True by default)

inputs.name: NEWG
inputs.description: OPTIONAL // Allow to start a new game (True by default)

inputs.name: FIELD
inputs.description: OPTIONAL // Allow to save user-drawn fields (True by default)

outputs.name: IOS
outputs.description: DisCo IO settings (to use with the DisCoPlayer component)

inputs.name: GA
inputs.description: OPTIONAL // Game Area as a box. Default is (-5.0, 5.0, -5.0, 5.0, 0, 5.0)

inputs.name: EG
inputs.description: OPTIONAL // Additional environment geometry as mesh

inputs.name: BPG
inputs.description: OPTIONAL // Blueprint geometry for assembly guidance (does not act as collider)

inputs.name: GP
inputs.description: OPTIONAL // Activate ground plane (True by default)

inputs.name: FR
inputs.description: OPTIONAL // Field resolution

inputs.name: SETUP
inputs.description: OPTIONAL // DisCo setup data

inputs.name: ENV
inputs.description: OPTIONAL // DisCo environment data

inputs.name: PLAY
inputs.description: OPTIONAL // DisCo player settings for multi-player mode

inputs.name: PATH
inputs.description: Path where to save the DisCo .json file

inputs.name: NAME
inputs.description: Export file name

inputs.name: SAVE
inputs.description: True to export

outputs.name: FILES
outputs.description: .Path to the setup and players files

inputs.name: AGGR
inputs.description: Aggregation from which to extract the smart attributes

inputs.name: ID
inputs.description: Script input ID.

inputs.name: CONN
inputs.description: Connection to deconstruct

outputs.name: PART
outputs.description: Part to which the connection belongs to

inputs.name: ID
inputs.description: Name of the attribute

inputs.name: VAL
inputs.description: Value of the attribute (any type of Gh-compatible data possible)

inputs.name: TR
inputs.description: OPTIONAL // Transformable. Set it to True for Geometry, False for other types of data (False by default)

inputs.name: CONN
inputs.description: Connections controlling the activation of the SmartAttribute instance

inputs.name: CM
inputs.description: Connection mask, with one value for each connection provided in CONN, describing the required layout (1 for free connection, -1 for occupied connectio

outputs.name: ATTR
outputs.description: SmartAttribute instance to attach to a component

inputs.name: NAME
inputs.description: Part name

inputs.name: GEO
inputs.description: Part geometry. It will be converted to mesh - to improve performance, perform the conversion before adding to the part and user a low-poly count

inputs.name: CONN
inputs.description: Connections list

inputs.name: COLL
inputs.description: OPTIONAL // Collider geometry (for collision detection). A collider will be automatically generated. For complex parts, automatic generation might not

inputs.name: FIELD
inputs.description: OPTIONAL // Field to associate with the part for Field-Driven Aggegation (Needed only when using multiple fields within one aggregation)

inputs.name: HI
inputs.description: OPTIONAL // Hierarchy: List of parts composing the part at a lower heriarchical level in the aggregation

inputs.name: ATTR
inputs.description: OPTIONAL // Part attributes

inputs.name: E_COLL
inputs.description: OPTIONAL // Additional collider geometry (e.g. assembly tool), to be checked in Local Constraints mode

inputs.name: SUP
inputs.description: OPTIONAL // Required supports for part placement, to be checked in Local Constraints mode

inputs.name: AEC
inputs.description: OPTIONAL // Adjacency/Exclusion constraints, to be checked in Local Constraints mode

inputs.name: OC
inputs.description: OPTIONAL // Orientation constraints, to be checked in Local Constraints mode

inputs.name: DIR
inputs.description: Directions of the support locations as lines

inputs.name: GEO
inputs.description: OPTIONAL // Geometry of the part the support belongs to (useful for checking if the supports are correctly placed)

inputs.name: DIR
inputs.description: Directions of the support locations as lines

inputs.name: PN
inputs.description: OPTIONAL // If the adjacency/exclusion direction has to be associated to a specific part

inputs.name: AE
inputs.description: OPTIONAL // Constraint type: True for adjacency, False for exclusion (True by default)

inputs.name: PLN
inputs.description: Plane to use as constraints

inputs.name: POS
inputs.description: OPTIONAL // True to place parts on the positive direction of the Z axis, False for the negative direction (True by default)

inputs.name: SOFT
inputs.description: OPTIONAL // True to check only the part center point, False to check also for geometry intersection (True by default)

inputs.name: REQ
inputs.description: OPTIONAL // True to make the constrains necessary for the aggregation to happen, False to make it optional (True by default)

inputs.name: PART
inputs.description: OPTIONAL // Name of the parts to which the constraint is supposed to be applied on. If not specified, the constraint is applied to all parts

inputs.name: PLN
inputs.description: Connection plane

inputs.name: T
inputs.description: OPTIONAL // Connection type (to be used with Rule Generator component)

inputs.name: DIR
inputs.description: Directions of the part orientation to be tested (as Line or Vector)

inputs.name: R
inputs.description: Angle range which is allowed for the transformed part

inputs.name: PLN
inputs.description: OPTIONAL // Plane where to calculate the angle (Default is RhinoXY)

inputs.name: PART
inputs.description: Parts to deconstruct

outputs.name: GEO
outputs.description: Geometry of the part (as mesh). If Brep geometry is needed, can be stored in the component as attribute, or obtained by transforming the original geom

outputs.name: TR
outputs.description: Transformation applied to the part. Can be used to transform other geometries in a similar way (eg. replace a low poly component with a more detailed

outputs.name: CHILD
outputs.description: Children parts attached to the part

outputs.name: ADD_COLL
outputs.description: Additional collider applied to the part

inputs.name: TXT
inputs.description: Text description of the rule with format "Part1|Conn1_Part2|Conn2"

inputs.name: COLL
inputs.description: Collider object

outputs.name: CONN
outputs.description: If collider is Multiple, connections associated with the collider

outputs.name: VC
outputs.description: If collider is Multiple, valid connections not causing collisions

inputs.name: GEO
inputs.description: Geometry of the collider(s)

inputs.name: MUL
inputs.description: OPTIONAL // Set to True if you are using multiple colliders and it is sufficient for one of them not to collide (False by default)

inputs.name: ALL
inputs.description: OPTIONAL // If MUL is set to True, set to True to check all colliders (False by default, search will stop after finding a valid collider)

inputs.name: CONN
inputs.description: OPTIONAL // If MUL is set to True, associate a connection to each collider (e.g. a picking position for the tool collider).

inputs.name: AGGR
inputs.description: Aggregation from which to extract the graph

inputs.name: FG
inputs.description: OPTIONAL // True to compute the full graph (including edges on overlapping connections), False to create only the aggregation sequence graph (True by

inputs.name: TOL
inputs.description: OPTIONAL // Tolerance below which two connections will be considered connected (only for full graph mode - default is Wasp global tolerance)

inputs.name: FR
inputs.description: OPTIONAL // When computing the full graph, filter the found connections according to a custom rule set (False by default)

inputs.name: CR
inputs.description: OPTIONAL // When computing the full graph with FR set to True, rules to use as connection filter (default values are the Aggregation rules)

inputs.name: F
inputs.description: OPTIONAL // True to flatten the edges list, False to maintain edges grouped by node (True by default)

outputs.name: N
outputs.description: Graph nodes (each placed at a part's center)

inputs.name: PART
inputs.description: Parts definition for the aggregation

inputs.name: FILE
inputs.description: File where the aggregation is saved (.json)

inputs.name: RENUM
inputs.description: If True, Part IDs are renumbered in sequential order, avoiding issues with missing IDs if elements have been removed from the Aggregation (False by de

inputs.name: AGGR
inputs.description: Aggregation to save

inputs.name: PATH
inputs.description: Path where to save the aggregation

inputs.name: NAME
inputs.description: Name of the exported file

inputs.name: SAVE
inputs.description: True to export

inputs.name: PART
inputs.description: Parts from which to generate a parts catalog

inputs.name: NUM
inputs.description: Amounts of each part in the catalog

inputs.name: LIM
inputs.description: OPTIONAL // If True, the catalog will be limited, and aggregation will stop after using the given parts numbers. If False, the given numbers will be u

inputs.name: AD
inputs.description: OPTIONAL // If True, catalog will be adaptive, and change its internal probabilities according to the aggregation state (False by default). Works only

inputs.name: P1
inputs.description: Name of base part

inputs.name: C1
inputs.description: Id of base connection

inputs.name: P2
inputs.description: Name of new part to be aggregated

inputs.name: C2
inputs.description: Id of new connection

inputs.name: AGGR
inputs.description: Aggregation from which to extract the rules

inputs.name: ON
inputs.description: OPTIONAL // If replacing parts, old names of the existing parts in the aggregation

inputs.name: NN
inputs.description: OPTIONAL // If replacing parts, new names of the parts to replace with. Order should match the order provided in ON

outputs.name: GR
outputs.description: Graph rules to recreate the aggregation

outputs.name: PREV
outputs.description: If the provided aggregation contained parts assigned before the aggregation algorithm (in the PREV input), those parts are returned here. WARNING: whe

inputs.name: PART
inputs.description: Parts from which to visualize the rules

inputs.name: R
inputs.description: Rules to visualize

inputs.name: SF
inputs.description: OPTIONAL // Spacing factor between rules visualizations (2.0 by default)

inputs.name: PLN
inputs.description: OPTIONAL // If the rules should be visualized in a different location than the worldXY, base plane of the desired coordinate system

inputs.name: SI
inputs.description: OPTIONAL // True to show rule index in the list, False to hide it (True by default)

inputs.name: ST
inputs.description: OPTIONAL // True to show connection types, False to hide them (True by default)

inputs.name: PART
inputs.description: Sub-parts to be assembled

inputs.name: TR
inputs.description: Relative transformation of each sub-part in the higher hierarchy assembly

inputs.name: ATTR
inputs.description: Attribute to deconstruct

inputs.name: AGGR
inputs.description: Aggregation from which to extract hierarchical parts

inputs.name: LEVEL
inputs.description: Hierarchy level (0 to return the same parts in input)

outputs.name: SUB_P
outputs.description: Parts at the selected hierarchy level

inputs.name: BOU
inputs.description: List of geometries defining the boundaries of the field. Geometries must be closed breps or meshes.

inputs.name: RES
inputs.description: Resolution (Dimension of each cell)

inputs.name: PLN
inputs.description: OPTIONAL // Field base plane (WorldXY by default)

outputs.name: E_FIELD
outputs.description: Empty field. Assign values with the "Wasp_Field" component

inputs.name: PART
inputs.description: Parts to be aggregated (can be more than one)

inputs.description: OPTIONAL // Previous aggregated parts. It is possible to input the results of a previous aggregation, or parts transformed with the TransformPart comp

inputs.name: N
inputs.description: Number of parts to be aggregated (does not count parts provided in PREV)

inputs.name: RULES
inputs.description: Rules for the aggregation

inputs.name: FIELD
inputs.description: Scalar field to drive the aggregation (parts will be added following higher values in the field)

inputs.name: CAT
inputs.description: OPTIONAL // Part Catalog (to specify fixed numbers or proportions between part types

inputs.name: MODE
inputs.description: OPTIONAL // Switches between aggregation modes: 0 = no constraints, 1 = local constraints, 2 = global constraints, 3 = local + global constraints

inputs.name: GC
inputs.description: OPTIONAL // Global constraints to apply to aggregation

inputs.name: ID
inputs.description: OPTIONAL // Aggregation ID

inputs.name: RESET
inputs.description: Recompute the whole aggregation

outputs.description: Aggregated parts (includes both PREV input and newly aggregated parts)

inputs.description: Script variable Field

inputs.name: E_FIELD
inputs.description: List of geometries defining the boundaries of the field. Geometries must be closed breps or meshes. All points of the field outside the geometries wil

inputs.name: VAL
inputs.description: Values to assign to each cell

outputs.name: FIELD
outputs.description: Field object (to be used to drive the FieldAggr component)

inputs.description: Field to deconstruct

outputs.description: Field bounding box (aligned to the base plane)

inputs.description: Field to be transformed

inputs.name: PLN
inputs.description: Target plane

inputs.name: FIELD
inputs.description: Field object to extract isolines from

inputs.name: PLN
inputs.description: Plane for isolines extraction (0: XY Plane, 1: YZ Plane, 2: XZ Plane)

inputs.name: T
inputs.description: Z parameter where to extract isolines

inputs.name: ISO
inputs.description: Isolevel of the curves

inputs.name: FIELD
inputs.description: Field object to extract iso-voxels from

inputs.name: ISO
inputs.description: Isolevel of the voxel mesh

outputs.description: Voxel mesh at the chosen iso-level

inputs.description: Field to save

inputs.name: PATH
inputs.description: Path where to save the field

inputs.description: Name of the exported file

inputs.name: SAVE
inputs.description: True to export

inputs.description: File where the field is saved (.json)

inputs.description: True to reload the saved file
